Value(Example): Case 16bits : 16 Case 32bits : 32 *When using DRW2D, set 16bits or more.

Case Enable : 1 Case Disable : 0 *The settings in the [TCON and LCD Settings] tab will be displayed.
Case Port 0, Bit 0: GPIO_PORT_0_PIN_0 *The settings in the [TCON and LCD Settings] tab will be displayed.
Case Enable : 1 Case Disable : 0 *The settings in the [TCON and LCD Settings] tab will be displayed.
